name: Cumulus Pants Yellow
name_cn: 积云 裤子 黄色
description:
Temp. Rating: -35 / 15 °C
Carrying Capacity: 3K µSCU
Be bold and brave the cold with Cumulus pants. Designed with a synthetic fabric that insulates the inside and wicks away moisture from the outside, these pants provide protection against temperature drops to -35 °C.
description_cn:
适用温度：-35 / 15 °C
储物空间：3K μSCU
穿着"积云"裤勇敢地面对寒冷吧。这些裤子采用合成纤维设计，可将内部隔绝并阻止外界水汽进入，最低可防范-35 °C的低温。
